Example 1:  Counting Nonrecurring Income
A Veteran receives a $500 Social Security retroactive check on March 14, 2015.  Count this income starting April 1, 2015, and remove it April 1, 2016.
Note
:  If the nonrecurring income causes the award to be discontinued,
38 CFR 3.31
applies to a reopened award and the beneficiary is ineligible for 13 months.
Reference
:  For more information on the payment period, see
M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, 1.A.6
, and
VAOPGCPREC 2-1989
.
